Dispute_Type: Alleged unauthorized use of copyrighted works in products
Legal_Issue: Whether plaintiffs have the right to seize products before judgment due to alleged copyright infringement
Evidence_Assessment: Plaintiffs demonstrated a prima facie case of infringement; defendant lacked supporting evidence
Burden_of_Proof: On plaintiffs to show ownership and likelihood of infringement
Credibility_Factor: Defendant's arguments dismissed due to lack of evidence
Legal_Rule: Copyright owners may seize infringing copies or plates before judgment if entitled under Canadian or provincial law
Standard_of_Review: Prima facie standard for pre-judgment seizure
Procedural_Issue: Pre-judgment seizure application under statutory authority
Grounds_for_Claim: Unauthorized use of plaintiffs' copyrighted intellectual property
Outcome_on_Merits: Plaintiffs entitled to seizure based on preliminary merits
Review_Standard: Statutory interpretation and equitable considerations for interim relief
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Court reviewed evidence from both sides; defendant failed to substantiate counterclaims
Key_Evidence_Considered: Ownership documentation, chain of title, product comparison, defendantâ€™s lack of rebuttal evidence
Legal_Framework: Canadian copyright law, specifically Copyright Act
Applicant_Challenge: Establishing ownership and infringement prior to trial
Defendant_Response: Challenged ownership but provided no evidentiary support
Evidence_Type: Documentary evidence, transaction records, product samples
Remedy_Requested: Pre-judgment seizure of allegedly infringing products and materials
Outcome: Plaintiffs permitted to seize specified items from defendant and retailers
Remedy_Sought: Seizure and preservation of evidence/assets pending judgment
Resolution_Mechanism: Ex parte motion for pre-judgment seizure
Authority: Federal jurisdiction under Canadian copyright law
Claimant_Status: Rightful owners of AMAV intellectual property, including copyrights
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Unauthorized reproduction and distribution of copyrighted works
Applicable_Process: Pre-trial interlocutory relief under statutory seizure provisions
